name: Block Sale: Twilight Saga
description:
Entry for the Butterscotch Shenanijam 2017. 

Theme: Slurb and Save

Play as a sad guy in his quest for the magic potion at a block sale.

Meet crazy characters and read some funny jokes!

Controls:

WASD - movement

E- talk to people

Hold R - inventory

F - toggle fullscreen

Esc - pause game

1 - normal mode

2 - dance mode (space to slide)

Thanks for playing!

programming and story: Zach Mayer

art, animation, and level design: Kevin Nie

music: Gareth Wiecko

latest update: 6/5/17
